title: Dan the Birthday Man!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211121510im_/http:/typophile.com/files/danpod_4882.png)

Have a warm one!

hrisL

 [‹ Need a ffffound invite](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211121510/http:/typophile.com/node/43610 "Go to previous forum topic") [Words for CakeType ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211121510/http:/typophile.com/node/52008 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: Happy birthday und alles Gute, Dan!
Happy bday :)
Herzlichen Glückwunsch!
Happy birthday!
Happy Birthday, Dan. TypeOff and RockOn. ;)

Have a great birthday, Dan :^)  
————————————————————-  
Yes, you’re young and still in style!
Happy birthday!
happy birthday, dan!
Thank you so much, everyone! I almost missed this post, too. I’m glad that I didn’t.

Not to blow your mind or anything, Chris, but…

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211121510im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chrislozosfromdan081205_5313.png)

Since I don’t have rights to any pictures of Dan I can’t post a comp. So I’ll make do with sincerest wishes and good cheer —- for the man who makes us all proud to be typographers & typophilers. When I think of Dan I think of a great-looking guy and all the good things within, of how to be cool without really trying.

j a m e s

Herzlichen Glückwunsch (nachträglich) Dan!  
Thomas

Alryte. Got this together.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211121510im_/http:/typophile.com/files/happy_dan_2008_3810.gif)

Moo, whistle etcetera!

j a m e s

“Not to blow your mind or anything”

LOL!!! Freakin’ awesome! :-)

ChrisL

I don’t know about great-looking, but thanks for the kudos anyway. BTW, Chris’s photos of me are just public images from my Flickr stream.

Thomas, ich danke dir herzlich auch!
(Belated) happy birthday, Dan!

Happy birthday friend. May you always... face the wind!

hhp
Happy Birthday Dan!!!

I think Dan should use his own C from now on :-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211121510im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dan-bigC_6241.jpg)

ChrisL

Wow, Chris, that beats my two-second iPhone screenshot integration! That is really quite awesome.

Thanks, too, Mark and Hrant!
All the best Dan. Enjoy!
Viel, viel zu spät .... too late, Dan – but: All the best for you in this new year in your life!

Hope you had a great day, Dan! I used to be a redhead. Now, I’m salt and paprika.

Sharon

Sorry it’s late but Happy Belated Birthday.

Hope it was great!

Take Care

Andy
